events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this product is not what I paid for.
The system has categorized this issue as related to a refund request based on the keywords in the customer's message.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle this refund case and will respond shortly to assist the customer.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I am here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue and proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item that was delivered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3 to 5 business days and provide a prepaid shipping label for the return.
That sounds good, I appreciate your quick response and the refund process. I will send the package back as soon as I get the label.
The refund request has been processed and the prepaid return label has been emailed to you. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We wanted to check in and ensure you have received your refund and were satisfied with how we handled your request.
Since there has been no further communication, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us, and we hope to serve you better next time.
